[b]
A Nation of Warrior's ,Witch Craft, And Dark [/b]Deceivers /  politicians
Location, The Winking Skeever Solitude
SevenBase BombShell Body, Needs [url=http://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&sqi=2&ved=0CCEQFjAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F26800%2F&ei=AA6tVJWVDofvavGRgIAN&usg=AFQjCNGMGH9REqtAwQUy4xKbAe5mx8i2oA&sig2=ptUnmr8OOw6yPM3H350MMw&bvm=bv.83134100,d.d2s]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[color=rgb(255, 255, 255)]
[/color][/url]Installed or similar, Standalone apart from skeleton
Outfit, GothiChix Long Dress and Gloves  by Sevennity
Nord race, combat class nightingale,combat style spellsword
Weight set at 100, I prefer her between 30-40 smaller boobs
you can change the weight quite easy with console comand , Fire Fox it
Stengths, 1handed weapons,archery,light armor,sneak,destruction
Some of her spells and perks,savaqge strike,lightning bolt,fast heal
Nightingale shadow perk,armsman,Bladesman,magic resistance,stealth
[size=4]Original[/size] version of [size=4]Seven[/size] has pink hair and skimpy outfit spiderweb eye makeup
Shes stealthy and good with a sword and bow
If Asked to overite,overite all
